text: Marsha Caspar, now 57, and Glenna DeJong, 58, were the first same-sex couple legally wed in the state of Michigan. “We just got all excited,” DeJong recalls. “… We’d been waiting a long time.” Twenty-seven years, to be exact. https://www.michiganadvance.com/2019/03/22/march-22-2014-when-marriage-equality-first-briefly-ruled-in-michigan/ …
